BOARD AND MANAGEMENT

  • Chairman

    Jamal Majid Bin Thaniah

    Jamal Majid Bin Thaniah is the Group Chief Executive Officer of Dubai World, one of the biggest holding companies in the world that manages and supervises a diversified portfolio of businesses in a variety of sectors, including Transport& Logistics, Urban Development, Drydocks & Maritime, Investment & Financial services and Energy and Natural Resources.

    Read More

  • Group Chief Executive Officer

    Mohammed Sharaf

    Mohammed Sharaf has served as Group Chief Executive Officer of the Group since 2005 and as a Director of the Company since 30 May 2007.

    Read More

  • Board Member

    Mohammed Al Muallem

    With almost three decades of port terminal operations and management experience, Mohammed Al Muallem, the Senior Vice President and Managing Director of DP World UAE Region, has led the growth and development of the region's most important port through a period of major expansions, defining and driving its strategic vision.

    Read More
